body: Hello I'M BorraMC as you know! Today I want ask you about the server. I've been to this server for 2 months but I'm sure about that there are still many things that I don't know. Please tell me <3

title: Heya!

replies.body:
Hi there,
Well, here's everything about the website, the whole website, and nothing but the website. http://avicus.net/forums/c3723efec Thanks Y0urm0m1!

About the server, hmm... Where do I start?

replies.body: I actually wonder 'bout the new update of Avicus. What will be new?
replies.body_tagged: I actually wonder 'bout the new update of Avicus. What will be new?

replies.body:
Thew new update
otherwise known as the "nise" update
will be featuring a whole ton of new gamemodes, including a new website.
Some include
CTW and SG.
You can find more information 
here: http://avicus.net/forums/eaf756770
Or you can always go here: https://www.facebook.com/AvicusNetwork for updates on the new update.
